Package au.csiro.pathling.projection

Class Projection

java.lang.Object
au.csiro.pathling.projection.Projection
public class Projection extends Object
An abstract representation of a projection of FHIR data, with the ability to select columns, filter the result and make use of constants.

    Defines constraints that can be applied to projection results.

  • Constructor Details

    • Projection

      public Projection(@Nonnull Enumerations.ResourceType subjectResource, @Nonnull List<ConstantDeclaration> constants, @Nonnull ProjectionClause selection, @Nonnull Optional<ProjectionClause> where)
      Creates a new unconstrained Projection.
      Parameters:
      subjectResource - the resource type that the projection is based upon
      constants - the constants available to expressions within the projection
      selection - the clause that defines the columns to be included
      where - the clause that defines the rows to be included

  • Method Details

    • execute

      public Dataset<Row> execute(@Nonnull ExecutionContext context)
      Executes the projection, returning a dataset that can be used to retrieve the result.
      Parameters:
      context - The execution context
      Returns:
      The dataset that represents the result of the projection
